# Remove Header Row from Purchase List Modal

## User Request

Remove the table header that shows column labels (Produto, Estoque Atual, Cobertura, Em Ordem, Venda/dia, Necessidade, Comprar, Valor Estimado) from the purchase list modal.

## Changes Made

1. Removed the sticky header row with column labels from the product list
2. Moved the "Select All" checkbox to the filters section at the top
3. Kept the product rows with all their information intact

## Result

The modal now has a cleaner appearance without the redundant header labels, while maintaining all functionality and information display within each product row.
